title: EPISTOLAE JP Meyer
html:
EPISTOLAE JP Meyer

Yesterday I purchased a copy of the VERBATIM book. This morning I learned about pleonasties. This afternoon I caught Bill Gates on cnn.com discussing the AIDS epidemic problem. Its a shame he didn't mention the non-problematic AIDS epidemic.

Thanks for the fun,

JP Meyer
